_id.description: MongoDB ObjectId - unique identifier for the connection relationship (transformed to connectionId in API responses)

careerAgentId.description: User ID of the career agent (required only when connectionType is 'careerAgent')

candidateId.description: User ID of the candidate (required only when connectionType is 'careerAgent')

requestorUserId.description: User ID of the person who initiated the connection request (required only when connectionType is 'friend')

recipientUserId.description: User ID of the person who received the connection request (required only when connectionType is 'friend')

connectionType.description: Type of connection - friend relationship or career agent mentorship

relationshipStatus.description: Current status of the connection relationship

startDate.description: When the connection relationship started (defaults to current date)

endDate.description: When the connection relationship ended (null if still active)

message.description: Additional message about the connection relationship

createdAt.description: When the relationship was created (automatically set by timestamps)

updatedAt.description: When the relationship was last updated (automatically set by timestamps)

careerAgent.description: Virtual field - populated career agent user profile details

candidate.description: Virtual field - populated candidate user profile details

requestor.description: Virtual field - populated requestor user profile details

recipient.description: Virtual field - populated recipient user profile details
